metadata.title: CVE-2020-11988 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Apache XmlGraphics Commons 2.4 and earlier is vulnerable to server-side request forgery, caused by improper input validation by the XMPParser. By using a specially-crafted argument, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the underlying server to make arbitrary GET requests. Users should upgrade to 2.6 or later.

criterions.comment: xmlgraphics-commons package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
